text: Roberto Gervaso (July 9, 1937 â€“ June 2, 2020) was an Italian writer and journalist. He won the Premio Bancarella twice: for L'Italia dei Comuni in 1967, and for Cagliostro in 1973. He was born in Rome. Gervaso died on June 2, 2020 in Milan at the age of 82. ==References== Category:1937 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Italian journalists Category:Writers from Rome
title: Roberto Gervaso
